title: Canadian Media Bias in Palestine Reporting (Work in Progress)
text:
This project is inspired by reporting in the US done by The Column, as well as ongoing work in Canada that has been reported by The Breach.
We know there is bias in the Canadian media landscape, and we want to show you just how much.
The goals of this project are to have an ongoing place where you can check in and see how our journalists our doing.



Fleshed out site
Place to contribute data that you have found
